option.name: description
option.value: Method attempts to convert scenario.getPriority().toString() to ScenarioDisplayData.Priority enum without null check, risking NullPointerException if priority is null.

option.name: impact
option.value: Could crash the application when displaying test scenarios in UI, interrupting test planning workflow.

option.name: suggestedFix
option.value: Add null check for scenario.getPriority() before conversion, or use a default priority value if null.

option.name: title
option.value: Potential NPE when converting scenario priority

option.name: verificationReason
option.value: Verified through WHOLE_FILE analysis

option.name: summary
option.value: Adds multiple test scenarios to the plan with UI updates

option.name: description
option.value: Method attempts to convert scenario.getPriority().toString() to ScenarioDisplayData.Priority enum without null check, risking NullPointerException if priority is null.

option.name: impact
option.value: Could crash the application when displaying final test plan in UI, preventing user from seeing generated test scenarios.

option.name: suggestedFix
option.value: Add null check for scenario.getPriority() before conversion, or use a default priority value if null.

option.name: title
option.value: Potential NPE when converting scenario priority

option.name: verificationReason
option.value: Verified through WHOLE_FILE analysis

option.name: summary
option.value: Builds final test plan from accumulated data

option.name: description
option.value: Method validates optionLabels size and optionDescriptions count but doesn't validate that optionLabels or optionDescriptions contain non-empty strings, allowing potentially invalid UI options.

option.name: impact
option.value: Could display empty or misleading options to user, leading to incorrect test planning decisions or UI errors.

option.name: suggestedFix
option.value: Add validation to ensure each optionLabel and optionDescription is non-null and non-empty before creating UserQuestion object.

option.name: title
option.value: Incomplete validation of user question parameters

option.name: verificationReason
option.value: Verified through WHOLE_FILE analysis

option.name: summary
option.value: Method handles user questions during test planning with validation and UI notification
